channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping on street, 23rd February
item.description:
Building material (ply sheets, timber) was dumped on the street near house no. 33 about a week ago.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Casimir Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Fly tipping everywhere, 23rd February
item.description:
Previous comment says that this is TfL land and is therefore outside the council’s scope to clean up. Surely this isn’t correct?! Yes the land is adjacent to the roundabout but it’s still council land? TfL don’t respond to emails anyway, so pls advise.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lea Bridge Roundabout, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nitrous Oxide gas canister dumped in the road, 23rd February
item.description:
Large black gas canisters appearing about every 2 weeks, left dumped in the road or on pavement. Started since the new year
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Petts Wood Road, Poverest, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive Crater on Mini Roundabout, 23rd February
item.description:
This isn't a pothole any more, it is a CRATER! You claim that your contractors have been instucted but nothing has happened in weeks. This is more than a pothole so I am reporting this as a crater.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ryecroft Road, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: They have a sharp prickly bush over growing onto the pavement, 23rd February
